PackageOracle.name: DA_BILLING_PRODUCT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BILLING_PRODUCT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.40.489663000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_description IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_long_descr IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cust_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_nm IN VARCHAR2
,subscriber_service_count_ind IN NUMBER
,gl_account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,hsd_speed_desc IN VARCHAR2
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_code_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_description IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_long_descr IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cust_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_nm IN VARCHAR2
,subscriber_service_count_ind IN NUMBER
,gl_account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,hsd_speed_desc IN VARCHAR2
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_code_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_description IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_long_descr IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cust_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_nm IN VARCHAR2
,subscriber_service_count_ind IN NUMBER
,gl_account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,hsd_speed_desc IN VARCHAR2
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_code_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_billing_product;

body.name: DA_BILLING_PRODUCT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BILLING_PRODUCT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.40.503501000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_description IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_long_descr IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cust_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_nm IN VARCHAR2
,subscriber_service_count_ind IN NUMBER
,gl_account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,hsd_speed_desc IN VARCHAR2
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_code_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_product.add(fx), parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || billing_product_cd || '|' || billing_product_description || '|' || billing_product_long_descr || '|' || billing_product_cust_type_nm || '|' || line_of_business_nm || '|' || subscriber_service_count_ind || '|' || gl_account_nm || '|' || hsd_speed_desc || '|' || detail_product_group_nm || '|' || billing_product_code_type_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_product a
(
a.billing_product_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.billing_product_cd
,a.billing_product_description
,a.billing_product_long_descr
,a.billing_product_cust_type_nm
,a.line_of_business_nm
,a.subscriber_service_count_ind
,a.gl_account_nm
,a.hsd_speed_desc
,a.detail_product_group_nm
,a.billing_product_code_type_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_billing_product_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.billing_product_cd
,add.billing_product_description
,add.billing_product_long_descr
,add.billing_product_cust_type_nm
,add.line_of_business_nm
,add.subscriber_service_count_ind
,add.gl_account_nm
,add.hsd_speed_desc
,add.detail_product_group_nm
,add.billing_product_code_type_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.billing_product_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_product.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_description IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_long_descr IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cust_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_nm IN VARCHAR2
,subscriber_service_count_ind IN NUMBER
,gl_account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,hsd_speed_desc IN VARCHAR2
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_code_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_product.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || billing_product_cd || '|' || billing_product_description || '|' || billing_product_long_descr || '|' || billing_product_cust_type_nm || '|' || line_of_business_nm || '|' || subscriber_service_count_ind || '|' || gl_account_nm || '|' || hsd_speed_desc || '|' || detail_product_group_nm || '|' || billing_product_code_type_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_product a
(
a.billing_product_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.billing_product_cd
,a.billing_product_description
,a.billing_product_long_descr
,a.billing_product_cust_type_nm
,a.line_of_business_nm
,a.subscriber_service_count_ind
,a.gl_account_nm
,a.hsd_speed_desc
,a.detail_product_group_nm
,a.billing_product_code_type_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_billing_product_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.billing_product_cd
,add.billing_product_description
,add.billing_product_long_descr
,add.billing_product_cust_type_nm
,add.line_of_business_nm
,add.subscriber_service_count_ind
,add.gl_account_nm
,add.hsd_speed_desc
,add.detail_product_group_nm
,add.billing_product_code_type_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_product.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_description IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_long_descr IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_cust_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_nm IN VARCHAR2
,subscriber_service_count_ind IN NUMBER
,gl_account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,hsd_speed_desc IN VARCHAR2
,detail_product_group_nm IN VARCHAR2
,billing_product_code_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_product.add, parms=' || billing_product_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || billing_product_cd || '|' || billing_product_description || '|' || billing_product_long_descr || '|' || billing_product_cust_type_nm || '|' || line_of_business_nm || '|' || subscriber_service_count_ind || '|' || gl_account_nm || '|' || hsd_speed_desc || '|' || detail_product_group_nm || '|' || billing_product_code_type_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_product a
(
a.billing_product_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.billing_product_cd
,a.billing_product_description
,a.billing_product_long_descr
,a.billing_product_cust_type_nm
,a.line_of_business_nm
,a.subscriber_service_count_ind
,a.gl_account_nm
,a.hsd_speed_desc
,a.detail_product_group_nm
,a.billing_product_code_type_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.billing_product_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.billing_product_cd
,add.billing_product_description
,add.billing_product_long_descr
,add.billing_product_cust_type_nm
,add.line_of_business_nm
,add.subscriber_service_count_ind
,add.gl_account_nm
,add.hsd_speed_desc
,add.detail_product_group_nm
,add.billing_product_code_type_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_product.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_product.del, parms=' || billing_product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_billing_product a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.billing_product_id = del.billing_product_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_product.del');

END del;

END da_billing_product;
